content.p: Please fill in this online form, and upon submission, a registration acknowledgement email will be sent to you shortly. Notes: Amount to pay: The conference fee will include conference kits, morning tea break, lunch, and afternoon tea break. (Accommodation and transportation are excluded). Early Registration by 15 November: USD250 / MYR800 International / Local Registration after 15 November: USD300 / MYR1000 International / Local Option 1: Credit/debit card (Mastercard or Visa only): Step 1: Go to https://epay.nottingham.edu.my/. Step 2: In the "fees name" drop-down menu, choose "ICWES 2022 Conference (MYR) for Malaysian participants", or "ICWES 2022 Conference (USD) for international participants". Step 3: Make payment and attach payment slip in your reply to the registration acknowledgement email. Option 2: Bank transfers (telegraphic transfers) or direct bank-in to one of the following banks: HSBC Bank Malaysia Berhad Main Branch 2 Leboh Ampang 50100 Kuala Lumpur Bank Account Number: 301-879391-101 Swift code: HBMBMYKL Step 1: Indicate "ICWES2022 (F0015.54.04)" in your transaction details. Step 2: Save or scan to obtain the electronic copy of the payment proof. Step 3: Attach the electronic payment slip in your reply to the registration acknowledgement email. Important: Please remember to indicate the code number (F0015.54.04) in your transaction, and send us the payment slip immediately after the payment transaction. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
